text: Cycling in the United States is a minor sport in the country. ==Utility cycling== The reason speculated for the lack of use of bicycles usage in the United States is because of the dominance of cars and lack of safe spaces to use bikes. ==Cycle sport == Ayesha McGowan became the first African American female professional road cyclist. Major Taylor was the first African American world champion in cycling. ==References== Category:Sports in the United States by sport Category:Cycle racing in the United States
title: Cycling in the United States
